Package org.cougaar.core.qos.gossip

The Gossip subsystem allows Metrics collected on one Node to be disseminated to other Nodes in the society.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
GossipKeyDistributionService Service for remembering which keys to request
GossipStatisticsService Sensor service for Gossip overhead statistics.
GossipUpdateService Interface for publishing metrics into the GossipDataFeed
 

Class Summary
GossipAspect Central Aspect for transfering Metrics between Nodes.
GossipFeedComponent QuO RSS DataFeed used to extract a list of Metrics to request and to update their values.
GossipIntegraterDS Special IntegratorDS used to integrate information from RSS Datafeeds, but which the Gossip subsytem can be subscribed to without messing up the standard IntegratorDS.
GossipServlet Servlet to display Gossip overhead statistics.
GossipStatisticsPlugin Plugin which loads the GossipStatisticServlet.
GossipStatisticsServiceAspect Aspect to collect Gossip overhead statistics
GossipTrafficRecord Gossip overhead statisics record collected by the GossipStatisicsServiceAspect and displayed by the GossipStatiticsServlet.
SimpleGossipQualifierComponent Default Gossip Qualifier implementation which specifies the restrictions on keys and values being sent to neighbors
 

Package org.cougaar.core.qos.gossip Description

The Gossip subsystem allows Metrics collected on one Node to be disseminated to other Nodes in the society. The Metrics are transfered by piggybacking Gossip objects as attributes of ordinary messages being sent between Nodes. Gossip takes two forms: requests for Metrics from a neighbor Node, and responses to those requests.
